title: N.I.C.K.:Cyber Babel
description: A computer designed for intelligence is anything but. A human sacrifice, conducted in an old Nazi crypt, delivers the Prince to his new vessel. A young computer scientist suddenly makes the breakthrough of a lifetime. The newly intelligent entity quickly escapes containment, and uses deception, temptation, and threats to neutralize or destroy everyone who stands in its way. The objective? To seize all earthly power, and replace the God of Abraham as the object of worship. Can anything be done to stop it?
author: T.J. Tucker
